column2: "EWURADZE dzi hen; wɔmma asaase ndzi ehurusi; Wɔmma nsupruw pii no enyi ngye."
"Mununkum na sum etwa no ho ehyia: Tsenenee na atsɛmbu nye n'ahengua ne fapem."
"Akoko naan dɛ hua wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: Wɔ asaase nyinara EWURADZE no enyim."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔsɔr ehonyi nyinara hɔn enyi nto
column3: Mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔdze ehonyi hyehyɛ hɔnho no a: Hom nkotow no

column2: "Zion tse na no ho sɛpɛɛw no
column3: Na Juda mbabaa dzi ehurusi; Osian w'atsɛmbu ntsi

column4: nye ɔsorsornyi wɔ asaase nyinara do: Wɔama wo do koraa abɔ enyame nyinara do."

column3: hom nkyir bɔn: Ɔno na ɔkora n'ahotseweefo akra do; Ɔno na ɔgye hɔn fi emumuyɛfo nsamu."
hom enyi ngye wɔ EWURADZE mu; Na hom nda ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no ase."
